attributes.action: Sack all the MPs who cant make a deal in 2 years and LEAVE THE EU as voted on!!
attributes.additional_details:
17million people voted to leave, lets pull our fingres out and actually do what the people want. This whole fiasco is making GB look like a laughing stock to the world! Our MPs are useless and the prime minister needs to do something about it or should resign and allow someone to run the country who actually has an idea.

LIKE ME, ID RUN THE COUNTRY 100 X BETTER... VOTE FOR DAVE!
attributes.background: We voted to leave the EU and the MPs have had 2 years to create a deal. Instead they have not done anything and have just gone into parliment to sleep! WE DONT WANT DELAYS! THE PEOPLE VOTED LEAVE NOW LETS LEAVE

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for someone to be given or lose their job.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250967
